options.name: Gnasher Bait
options.description: Friendly Gnashers units within 18" gain Frenzy, Fury, and their Charge Range rolls are Maximised.

options.name: Moon Shrooms
options.description: Cannot be activated at the same turn as War Cry! The bearer's unit acts as if the General had used War Cry! this turn.

options.name: Goga Cauldron
options.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Phase. Until the end of the Player Turn, the bearer’s unit gains Fearless, Unstable, Dying Blow.

options.name: Omen of the Apocalypse
options.description: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP. X is equal to the number of friendly units containing Orc that are Engaged in Combat anywhere on the Battlefield, up to a maximum of +3.

options.name: Attack Gnasher
options.description: The wielder gains 3 additional Standard Melee Attacks, their Str is always 5 and AP is always 2.

options.name: Tazrek's Guard
options.description: +1 HP and Res is set to 6.

options.name: Monster Munch
options.description: The bearer can cast Totemic Summon (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell(6+).

options.name: Troll Hide
options.description: Mob is set to 6". The model's base is changed to 40×40 mm and its Height is set to 3. The model's base change cannot be ignored.

options.name: Pan of Protection Pinchin'
options.description:
When successfully wounded, the bearer may choose to use the attacker's Arm and/or its Special Save:
  • Use the Arm that the attacking model would have against the Attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Arm (including any modifiers), if available.
  • Use the Special Save that the attacking model would have against the Attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Special Save (including any modifiers), if available.

options.name: Skull Fetish
options.description: During the Siphon the Veil step of your Magic Phase, the wearer may gain Channel(D3) with Duration: One Turn. If a ‘3’ is rolled for this, all units within 6" of the wearer, suffer the Witchfire Miscast effect, where X is equal to 5.
